Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.31549575] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC = 16 μM), Streptococcus mutans(MIC > 100 μM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC = 64 μM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC > 100 μM);Yeast:Canidia albican (MIC > 100 μM)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.31549575]B-GR23 induced a hemolysis of 0.13%, 0.23%, 0.38%, 0.75%, 0.83% and 1.60% on human blood red cells at the concentrations of 25, 50, 75, 100, 150 and 200 μM.
Sequence Information.Comments: Although B-GR23 did not show a potent antimicrobial and antibiofilm activity, the outstanding characteristic is the low toxicity on human blood red cells, which makes it an ideal template peptide to derive more powerful antimicrobial peptides

Literature.Title: Brevinin-GR23 from frog Hylarana guentheri with antimicrobial and antibiofilm activities against Staphylococcus aureus
Literature.Author: Hengren Zhong, Zhipeng Xie, Shuxia Zhang, Hanqi Wei, Yanting Song, Yingxia Zhang, Manchuriga Wang
